title: The Path Of Christ
author: James George Deck (1807-1884)
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: O Lord, when we the path retrace
Which Thou on earth hast trod,
To man Thy wondrous love and grace,
v2: Thy love, by man so sorely tried,
The very spear that pierced Thy side
Drew forth the blood to save;
v3: Thou didst Thy Father's name confess,
v4: Thy path, uncheered by earthly smiles,
v5: O Lord, with sorrow, and with shame,
How little we, who bear Thy name,
v6: Give us Thy meek, Thy lowly mind;
We fain would like Thee be,
And all our rest and pleasure find
